column4: Could anyone help me? I have an ATI Radeon X800 Pro and when I try to install the restricted drivers and restart I get a black screen? :O
Because this is my first time trying Ubuntu and it's the only method I read about and could understand :(
Doesnt the video work without the restricted driver?
it does but I things like desktop effects etc are kind of choppy, I also wanted to do some light wine gaming
I have a ATI 9600 and the restricted drivers does not work with compiz effects.  How much memory is on your graphics card?
I had a radeon 9600xt and x1550 that I had working on ubuntu 7.04, i forget to mention it's my first time on 7.10 not linux/ubuntu in general ><
Oh!  I have the ATI version of ATI 9600.  Does your graphics work at all or just a black screen?
Want to do a side window?
I'm not sure what you mean?
I am using XChat and clicked your name and openned a "dialog" window.
Right click my name and "open dialog window"
I did but i don't think you can see my messages
I haven't seen any of your messages though ;p
Sorry I have to go.  Maybe another time.  Got to get the grays out my hair!
